titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing support for the designation of an Early Detection Month to enhance public awareness of the need for screening for breast cancer and all other forms of cancer.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: 8/6/2009--Introduced. Expresses support for the designation of an Early Detection Month to enhance public awareness of the need for cancer screening.
